ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I enjoyed this course so much and I'll surely recommend it to other students who are interested in theoretical chemistry, physical chemistry and computational chemistry.
It gives a good overall picture of what statistical mechanics is about. I would recommend it to anyone in theoretical chemistry.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course has greatly deepened my knowledge in statisitcal mechanics and its applications in computational chemistry research, the field I am interested in and plan to work on in my graduate research.
